text: We use Tilled & Stripe payment systems to gather End Users' data from financial institutions.

Pursuant to applicable law, you have the right to request and receive a copy of your personal data that we collect, process, and store in our capacity as a Service Provider.
Upon receipt of a written request, we shall, within ten (10) business days, provide you with such personal data in a commonly used electronic format, unless extenuating circumstances require a longer response time, which shall be communicated to you within the ten (10) business day period.
We will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual concerned.
We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of those purposes.
